EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-01 Future of APM and Cloud Optimization.ES- 5/1 Last Chance - Market
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance! The Future of APM and Cloud Optimization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-future-apm]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-future-apm]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I wanted to make sure you didn’t miss out on your chance to join us this Wednesday for an educational webinar focusing on the future of APM and cloud optimization.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-future-apm]]>
Join us on Wednesday at 11 am ET to learn:
- Trends in APM today - What to expect for the future of application performance assurance - How customers are getting the most value from APM integrations with AIOps technologies
Hope to see you there! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-future-apm]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-future-apm]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
